title: Peter Lawford: The Man Who Kept the Secrets
description: This New York Times best seller tells the glamorous, scandalous, and tragic story of a handsome, sophisticated Englishman who became a bobby-sox idol, a lover of Ava Gardner and Lana Turner, a Kennedy in-law, a member of Sinatraâ€™s Rat Pack, and an intimate confidante of Marilyn Monroe and Elizabeth Taylor.
author: James Spada
